price: او هغه ورځ (درياده كړئ) چې د الله دښمنان به جهنم ته ورغونډيږي او هغوى به كتار كتار كړى شي.
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ يُحۡشَرُ أَعۡدَآءُ ٱللَّهِ إِلَى ٱلنَّارِ فَهُمۡ يُوزَعُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: wayawma yuḥ'sharu aʿdāu al-lahi ilā al-nāri fahum yūzaʿūna
